1_executive_summary.feature_overview: Create a Custom GPT version of Lloyd that mimics the /start-feature workflow to create context, plans, and deliverables documents for project planning
1_executive_summary.business_value: Enables users to run the project planning workflow through OpenAI's ChatGPT interface without requiring Claude Code CLI, making the planning methodology accessible to more users
1_executive_summary.primary_goal: Create /lloyd Custom GPT that guides users through phased project planning - from scoping to context gathering to plan creation to deliverables - replicating the /start-feature workflow in a conversational GPT format
